# CapturedStructure.USDExportOptions

**Type Alias**

The type a captured structure uses to configure exports.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias USDExportOptions = CapturedRoom.USDExportOptions
```

## Generating a USDZ file

- **export(to:metadataURL:modelProvider:exportOptions:)**: Produces a 3D asset from the captured structure.
- **CapturedStructure.ModelProvider**: The type a captured structure uses to output sophisticated 3D models.

items.description: Produces a 3D asset from the captured structure.
items.name: export(to:metadataURL:modelProvider:exportOptions:)
